{}.response: [{"id":104,"verses":[{"id":30622,"verse":18,"kjv":"There is no fear in love; but perfect love casteth out fear: because fear hath torment. He that feareth is not made perfect in love.","places":[]}],"note":"Christ is perfect love. When we are in Christ, we are in perfect love and there is no judgment / condemnation. This life is always just a small blip in the eyes of eternity. Rest assured in perfect love knowing that no matter what this life brings, if you are in Christ, there is no condemnation and you have an eternal, living hope in Him!"}]
